> It occurs to me that =
you _might_ be best off not using the standard ARC
> writer that comes with=
 Heritrix. Rather implement your own writer that

then write the files to disk any way you like. In
> fact you could have it =
simply extract what data you are interested in and
> only write that piece =
of information. For information about writing custom
> modules refer to the=
 developers manual on our website. It and the user
> manual are quite compr=
ehensive and should give you a clear idea of

eader

ow the overall
